title: Microsoft Teams: Export API Support for Teams Control Messages
description:
Control Messages are system generated messages
on Teams client when an activity or event occurs. For example, User A was added
User B to a chat and shared all chat history. Export API, a compliance
archiving solution for Teams, goes beyond user generated Teams message and
provides support to archive Teams control messages. As part of this release,
Export API will support member add and member remove messages in the context of
Teams, chats, and channels.
